title: Heroes Wear Masks
description:
When Neal Brandenburg wanted to find a project for him and his kids to stave off lockdown boredom, he took up sidewalk chalk art. What he didn’t know was that his newfound hobby would deliver an inspirational message to an entire city.

Follow Neal him on Instagram or check out his artwork at Heroes Wear Masks.

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
